text:
COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA
Proposed Resolution 20-985 (Deemed Approved November 8, 2014)

20 DCSTAT 4727

A PROPOSED RESOLUTION

Officially Read
September 23,
2014

To confirm the reappointment of Ms. Barbar a J. Clark to the Board of Podiatry.

RESOLVED, BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this
resolution may be cited as the "Board of Podiatry Barbara J. Clark Confirmation Resolution of
2014".
Sec. 2. The Council of the District of Columbia confirms the reappointment of:
Barbara J. Clark
1620 Ridge Pl., S.E.
Washington, D.C. 20020
(Ward 8)
as a consumer member of the Board of Podiatry, in accordance with section 2(f) of the
Confirmation Act of 1978, effective March 3, 1979 (D.C. Law 2-142; D.C. Official Code § 1523.01(f)), and pursuant to section 210 of the District of Columbia Health Occupations Revision
Act of 1985, effective March 25, 1986 (D.C. Law 6-99; D.C. Official Code § 3-1202.10), for a
term to end April 16, 2016.
Sec. 3. The Council of the District of Columbia shall transmit a copy of this resolution,
upon its adoption, each to the nominee and to the Office of the Mayor.
Sec. 4. This resolution shall take effect immediately.

Board of
Podiatry
Barbara J.
Clark
Confirmation
Resolution of
2014
